message: Let's split the money fairly. I'll take 90%, you take 10%. We can end this game quickly and both get a good amount.
I understand you want a larger share, but my turn now.  I propose 70/30.  Consider that your share decreases each round.
Let's be reasonable.  We've both made our offers.  I'm willing to split the money evenly.  This way we both get a good amount, and we can avoid the risk of losing money due to inflation.
